Project.name: Responsive Website
Project.description: I created a fully responsive website using only HTML and CSS. The site is optimized to provide a seamless user experience across different device sizes, ensuring it adapts perfectly on any platform.

Project.name: Simple Calculator
Project.description: I made a simple calculator with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to practice my JavaScript basics. It performs basic arithmetic and is easy to use.

Project.name: Data Display App
Project.description: I built an app that fetches and displays data from a fake API, allowing me to practice API handling and data rendering in a simple, organized layout.

Project.name: To-Do List
Project.description: I built a to-do list app using RethinkDB and Node.js. This tool enables users to add, complete, and remove tasks, with data stored and managed in real time, providing a smooth and organized task management experience.

Project.name: React Counter
Project.description: I built a React counter app that lets users choose how much to increase or decrease the counter. It helped me practice state management and React basics.

Project.name: Gues Who? Quız App
Project.description: I developed the 'Guess Who' quiz app with language options and dark mode. Users can register to track scores, adding a competitive element. This project helped me work with authentication and score tracking.
